description: Dive into "Visakhapatnam's Architectural Wonders Unveiled" ‚Äî a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Visakhapatnam's Architectural Wonders Unveiled

places.generalDescription: Perched on a hillside in Visakhapatnam, Ross Hill Church offers stunning views of the sea and port. This popular tourist spot is known for its beautiful white exterior and attracts both religious followers and tourists alike due to its impressive architecture. Visitors can explore the church's interior and attend prayers, making it a must-visit destination in Andhra Pradesh.

sources.snippet: Ross Hill Church, also known as All Saints Church, stands out for its Gothic architecture. Located in the Port Area of Visakhapatnam, it sits atop Ross Hill, providing stunning views of the surrounding landscapes. This church is one of the oldest in the city, dating back to the colonial era.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Architectural Buildings in Visakhapatnam, India: A Must-See Guide ‚Äì Engineers and Architects of America

places.name: Ross Hill Church

reviews.text:
Went to the church in the evening. It's towards the secluded area of the town. The drive from city center was uneventful but involved an unmaned railway crossing. The church itself is very beautiful and dates back to the British time. The name of the church derives it's name from the first occupant of the place. Later a chapel was established and then converted to a church.
It provides some interesting views of the Port area and city.

Ross Hill Church, perched high above Visakhapatnam's harbor, is more than just a religious site-it's a serene retreat with one of the best views in the city. The church itself is modest but well-kept, offering a calm and quiet atmosphere perfect for reflection or a moment of silence. What sets this spot apart is the stunning vantage point. From the church grounds, you can look out over the port, city skyline, and coastline. It's especially beautiful at sunset, when the light spills over the hills and sea. The journey up the hill, though a bit steep, is worth every step for the peaceful environment and the views.

Rose Hill Church is a serene and picturesque destination located at the top of a hill, offering a peaceful escape from the daily hustle. The uphill walk takes around 10 minutes and is fairly manageable, though a bit of a workout. For those who prefer a more comfortable ascent, autos are readily available at the base of the hill, and you can also drive up with your own vehicle.

The view from the top is absolutely stunning - a panoramic sweep of the surrounding area that makes the climb worthwhile. What makes this spot even more special is the presence of not just the church, but also a mosque and a shrine nearby, all coexisting peacefully on the same hill. It adds a unique spiritual and cultural charm to the place.

Whether you're looking to spend some quiet time in reflection, take in the view, or just enjoy a peaceful walk, Rose Hill Church is a great spot to unwind. Highly recommended for a relaxing outing.

places.address: M7RP+5RH, Port Area, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 530001, India

places.generalDescription: The VMRDA INS Kursura Submarine Museum, located on RK Beach in Visakhapatnam, is a popular tourist attraction. This museum features the INS Kurusura, a Russian-built submarine that was inducted into the Indian Navy in 1969 and decommissioned in 2001 after 31 years of service. It is the first submarine museum in Asia and the second in the world.

sources.snippet: They are Borra caves (69 km), Submarine museum (12 km), Kailasagiri (15 km), Rishikonda Beach (21 km), Yarada Beach (6 km) etc. The city people prefer to commute by City buses and auto rickshaws as the primary mode of transport. The nearby railway station is Visakhapatnam Railway station, and nearby airport is Visakhapatnam airport.
sources.shortName: New Projects in Visakhapatnam | 911+ Upcoming Projects in Visakhapatnam

sources.snippet: The Submarine Museum INS Kursura is one of the most unique attractions in Visakhapatnam. This museum is housed in a decommissioned submarine, the INS Kursura, which served the Indian Navy for 31 years. The submarine, a Kalvari-class diesel-electric type, played a vital role in the Indo-Pakistani War of 1971.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Architectural Buildings in Visakhapatnam, India: A Must-See Guide ‚Äì Engineers and Architects of America

places.name: VMRDA INS Kursura Submarine Museum

reviews.text:
Must visit the spot. You can get a combo ticket which gives entry to the submarine, aircraft museum and sea harrier. They are all located in walkable distance near RK beach. Try to visit in the evening as it will be cool. There will be air conditioning throughout the tour, so no need to worry about ventilation.

There will be colourful lighting for submarine from the evening which will be a good view from opposite road.

There is no allocated car parking area around, but you can easily find bike parking on the pavement.

INS Kursura Submarine Museum ‚Äì A Fascinating Dive into Naval History

The INS Kursura Submarine Museum is an absolute must-visit if you're in Visakhapatnam. Stepping inside the actual decommissioned submarine gives a rare and thrilling glimpse into the life of naval officers underwater. It's not just a museum ‚Äì it feels like stepping into a preserved piece of living history.

The submarine itself is compact and impressive. As you move through the narrow corridors and peek into the control rooms, torpedo bays, and sleeping quarters, you can't help but admire the bravery and discipline of the crew who once lived and worked here for months at a time.
The museum staff, many of whom are ex-navy personnel, do an excellent job explaining the submarine's operations and sharing fascinating stories about life under the sea.

From a technical, historical, and emotional perspective, the INS Kursura offers a deeply enriching experience. It's also beautifully maintained, right by the beach, making it a perfect blend of education and a day out by the sea.

Tip: Visit in the evening for a cooler experience and enjoy the illuminated view of the submarine at night!

The INS Kursura Submarine Museum is one of the most fascinating attractions in Vizag and a must-visit for history and defense enthusiasts. Housed inside a real decommissioned submarine, the museum gives visitors a rare opportunity to step into the life of naval officers and sailors who once served at sea.

Walking through the narrow passages, control rooms, and crew quarters offers a deep appreciation of the discipline, courage, and challenges faced by submariners. The displays are informative and well-curated, showcasing the submarine's operations, equipment, and legacy.

The highlight is the chance to experience firsthand the compact living and working conditions inside a submarine, which leaves you with immense respect for the Indian Navy. Its location along RK Beach adds to the appeal, making it easy to combine with a beachside stroll.

Overall, the INS Kursura Submarine Museum is an educational, unique, and memorable experience that offers both adults and children a glimpse into India's rich naval history

places.address: P88J+V2W, RK Beach Rd, Kirlampudi Layout, Chinna Waltair, Pandurangapuram, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 530017, India

places.generalDescription: The TU 142 Aircraft Museum in Vishakhapatnam is a must-visit for those interested in Indian military history. It houses the preserved Tupolev Tu-142 aircraft, which served the Indian Naval system for over 29 years. Visitors can explore the aircraft and its aeronautical equipment, including engines, propellers, sonobuoys, anti-submarine missiles, and more.

sources.snippet: The TU 142 Aircraft Museum in Visakhapatnam is a unique attraction. It features a preserved Tupolev Tu-142 aircraft, which served the Indian Navy for 29 years. The aircraft has a remarkable accident-free flying record of 30,000 hours.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Architectural Buildings in Visakhapatnam, India: A Must-See Guide ‚Äì Engineers and Architects of America

places.name: TU 142 Aircraft Museum

reviews.text:
This museum is a must visit. It shows various historical facts and technical details about TU142 aircraft. It shows a model how an aircraft is inspired from a bird.

The museum also covers various duties of people working in aircraft. It shows models of aircraft parts.

You can get a combo ticket which gives entry to the submarine, aircraft museum and sea harrier. Try to visit in the evening as it will be cool.

Tu 142 Aircraft Museum is a real aircraft turned into the museum. The combo ticket for submarine and aircraft museum costs 100 rupees. Otherwise it is 70 rupees individually. Charges are separate for mobile or video camera. 30 mins are more than enough to cover this museum. If you are fascinated about aviation industry, you can visit it.

**TU 142 Aircraft Museum ‚Äì Family Visit ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞**

During our recent trip to Visakhapatnam, we visited the TU 142 Aircraft Museum located near RK Beach, close to the HPCL Colony. It was an exciting and educational experience for our whole family. The museum is centered around the decommissioned TU 142M aircraft, a long-range maritime patrol and anti-submarine warfare aircraft used by the Indian Navy.

The aircraft, now on display, has been beautifully preserved. We were amazed by its massive size and advanced features for its time. Inside the museum, there are several informative exhibits about the aircraft's history, its role in Indian defense, and the technology used. The children especially enjoyed the interactive screens and videos that explained how the aircraft operated.

The museum is well-maintained, with clean surroundings and helpful staff. We also appreciated the neatly arranged photo gallery and the short documentary that gave us more insights into naval aviation.

Overall, it was a fun and educational outing for all of us. The visit gave us a sense of pride in our nation's defense achievements. We highly recommend the TU 142 Museum to families visiting Vizag ‚Äì it's a great combination of learning and enjoyment.üëåüëçü§ùü§ùü§ùü•∞

places.address: P89H+5WX, Beach Rd, opp. Kursura Submarine museum, AU North Campus, HPCL Colony, Pandurangapuram, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 530017, India

places.generalDescription: Thotlakonda Buddhist Monastery is a historical site located on a hillock 15 km from the main city of Vizag. The complex holds cultural significance and features rock-cut inscriptions. Its proximity to the sea and sub-tropical climate made it an ideal location for monks to build the monastery.

sources.snippet: The name Totlakonda has been derived from the presence of rock cut through hewn in the bed rock of various shapes, sizes with 4 to 8 steps in the hillock by which water has been drawn for drinking water purpose. Thotlakonda     lies    about   15 Km. from Visakhapatnam in beach road located 128 meters high above sea level.
sources.shortName: Monuments | Visakhapatnam District, Government of Andhra Pradesh

places.name: Thotlakonda Buddhist Monastery

reviews.text: Very peaceful, not a lot of crowd. Well maintained space. Route is scenic and the guard was helpful and explained the history of the place. Original stupa was lost and restored later, but the layout of the place remains and was a nice experience to witness the beauty of this place. You can see the sea from here too.

This monastery used to be inhabited by monks thousands of years ago and the ruins are since then. The entry fee is quite minimal. There is a nice view point here which gives you panoramic views of the city and shoreline.

I really enjoyed the thotlakonda monastery ruins. Free entrance although you need to pay some charges while entering the road which leads to this. The signboards are quite informative and the place is free from guides. So you can just explore the beautiful and peaceful place on your own, the little signboards provide enough information to enjoy the place. The signboard outside gives a brief history of the place as well. Easily can covered in half an hour as the place is not very big.

places.address: RCH5+CM3, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 531163, India

sources.snippet: Dedicated to Lord Shiva, the Dharmalinga temple was built on the foothills at Panchadaria in Dharapalem Village. The temple follows the standard plan of the Dravidian temples in the south. The inviting entrance with a mandapa, followed by the central maha mandapa, kitchen, yagamandapa, kalyanamandpa followed by the exit.

places.generalDescription: Victory At Sea War Memorial is a seaside park located on Beach Road, dedicated to the Indian naval victory in 1971. It was opened in 1996 to honor the brave navy soldiers who were martyrs in the India-Pakistan war. The memorial commemorates the successful defense of INS Vikrant from a Pakistani submarine attack, which led to India's victory and the creation of Bangladesh.

sources.snippet: Victory At Sea Memorial is a prominent landmark in Visakhapatnam. It commemorates the Indian Navy‚Äôs victory in the Indo-Pakistani War of 1971. The memorial was constructed in 1996.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Architectural Buildings in Visakhapatnam, India: A Must-See Guide ‚Äì Engineers and Architects of America

places.name: Victory At Sea War Memorial

reviews.text:
Tall & impressive, this war monument reminds you of the glories of the Indian Navy during the 1971 war.
A telling tribute to our brave soldiers. Can be visited along with various other attractions as it just takes few minutes. Overseas the RK beach and provides good views of the sea.

This monument is a tribute to soldiers who fought for the nation in 1971. It is located on main road near RK beach near Kali Mata temple. Currently the memorial is closed for visitors as there are some renovations going on.

**Peaceful & Patriotic Spot**

A well-maintained war memorial honoring Navy heroes of the 1971 war. Located right on RK Beach, it's free to visit and perfect for a quiet, reflective stop. Great views and a strong sense of pride.

places.address: 31, Beach Rd, Kirlampudi Layout, Chinna Waltair, Pedda Waltair, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 530017, India

Spanning across a vast campus of 250 hectares, the institution offers a conducive environment for learning and research. Known for its strong academic programs and supportive faculty, it attracts students from diverse backgrounds including international students. Admission to this esteemed institution requires patience and timely completion of the admission process due to high demand.

reviews.text: I had an amazing experience working with ARK Architects and Interior Designers. They paid great attention to detail to all aspects of the building process from design to finish. They truly brought my dream home to life, Rohit and his assistant Santhoshini was responsive and dedicated to making sure every element aligned with my vision. I couldn't be happier with the final result and highly recommend them to anyone looking for top-notch architectural services!

After evaluating multiple options, I chose ARK Architects and Interior Designers, and I am genuinely thrilled with my decision. From our very first meeting, the team impressed me with their genuine professionalism and truly inviting demeanor. Swarna, who was assigned to help us with our project, expertly guided us through refining our ideas and brought our vision to life and ensuring every detail reflected our personal style. The carpentry team was also impressively adaptable, making adjustments as needed with patience and care.

Mr. Rohit was always available to address our questions, explaining every step of the process with clarity and reassurance. Throughout the project, the team's commitment to exceptional craftsmanship, seamless communication, and unwavering integrity made the entire experience smooth and delightful. The final result is a dream home completed to perfection-and all at a very reasonable price-a testament to their expertise that undoubtedly deserves a 5-star review.

Working with ARK Architects & Interiors was an incredible experience! Their team blends creativity with functionality like no other. They truly listened to our vision and translated it into a space that feels both elegant and deeply personal. From initial sketches to final execution, every step was handled with precision and care. If you're looking for the best architects and interior designers in Visakhapatnam, ARK is the team to trust. Their attention to detail, innovative design thinking, and client-focused approach set them apart

The city's future prospects have been closely watched, especially after plans to make it the executive capital fell through. This led to a surge in real estate activity, but the sector has since stabilized. Efforts are underway to develop Visakhapatnam as a key economic hub. Andhra University is playing its part by supporting startup initiatives and contributing to the region's entrepreneurial landscape.

places.name: Andhra University

reviews.text:
Andhra University, Visakhapatnam ‚Äì A Premier Hub of Learning and Heritage üéìüåä

Andhra University (AU) in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh, is one of India's oldest and most esteemed universities, known for its beautiful campus, academic excellence, and scenic coastal location. Established in 1926, Andhra University has a legacy of nurturing notable alumni and scholars, contributing significantly to higher education in South India. üèõÔ∏èüìò

The university's sprawling campus, with lush greenery and colonial-style architecture, is an inspiring place for students. Located near the Bay of Bengal, AU offers students a picturesque learning environment, complete with ocean views and serene landscapes that add to the charm. üåÖüå¥

Andhra University has a range of faculties, from Arts and Science to Engineering and Law, and offers diverse programs for both undergraduate and postgraduate studies. The AU College of Engineering and AU College of Arts and Commerce are especially renowned for their academic contributions. The campus also features a well-stocked library, advanced research facilities, and a variety of student activities.

Beyond academics, Andhra University is active in research and community engagement and hosts cultural events, seminars, and sports competitions that enrich student life. Visiting the campus is a treat in itself, offering a blend of natural beauty, academic vibrancy, and a rich history that makes it a standout institution in Indian education.
It good educational hub in Andhra state.I suggests to students must take education from this university

Andhra University, a prestigious institution with a legacy spanning 98 years.

In recent times, the university has embarked on a journey of transformation, with extensive development works underway.

Moreover, Andhra University has seen a resurgence in its academic pursuits, reclaiming its lost glory. With revamped curricula, research initiatives, and collaborations with leading institutions globally.

The revitalization of Andhra University is not just limited to infrastructure and academics but also extends to its vibrant campus life. Cultural events, sports tournaments, and extracurricular activities flourish, fostering a holistic development environment for students.

As Andhra University celebrates its rich history and looks towards a promising future, it continues to uphold its legacy of excellence.

places.generalDescription: CMR Central, located in Gajuwaka and known for its diverse shopping options, offers traditional sarees, dress material, home furnishings, technology products, cosmetics, health goods, and clothing. While not as large as the CMR in Vizag, it features limited eateries such as KFC, Pizza Hut, Burger King on the ground floor and Eaters Stop on the second floor. Additionally, there is an ice cream shop available.

sources.snippet: Probably two of the most preferred shopping destinations in the city, CMR and CMR Central have held their own distinctions in Vizag. While the former can always be seen buzzing with cheerful shoppers, the latter houses shopping, food and entertainment options under one roof. places.name: CMR Central

reviews.text:
CMR central is the best shopping mall in Gajuwaka and its surrounding. But This is not as big as CMR in vizag.
It has limited eateries KFC,pizza hut, burger king in ground floor and eaters stop in second floor. In addition to that one icecream shop is available.
For shopping, Reliance trends available in ground floor and first floor for shopping.
Pvr inox is available in second floor. But the main attraction of this mall is Gaming zone. Gaming zone is good for kids too.
Mostly the crowd for this mall is moderate except on holidays and Sunday's.I frequently visits this mall as it near to me to watch movies and eat food KFC and burger.
The mall is well maintained and clean.
Parking space is available both in cellar and front of the mall

A Shopper's Paradise in Gajuwaka: A Raving Review for CMR Central Mall
CMR Central Mall in Gajuwaka stands as a true landmark and a fantastic destination for shopping, entertainment, and dining in Visakhapatnam. For anyone in the Gajuwaka area looking for a comprehensive retail and leisure experience, this mall consistently delivers a positive and fulfilling visit.
One of the immediate strong points of CMR Central is its impressive range of shopping options. From popular apparel brands like Max, Reliance Trends, Mufti, and Levi's to electronics at Reliance Digital and home furnishings at Hometown, the mall caters to a diverse set of needs and preferences. Whether you're hunting for the latest fashion, updating your gadgets, or furnishing your home, you're likely to find what you're looking for under one roof. The quality of products generally aligns with good standards, and while some items might be on the higher end of the price spectrum, there are always reasonably priced options available.
Beyond just shopping, CMR Central truly excels as an entertainment hub. The INOX multiplex, with its multiple screens and comfortable seating, is a major draw, offering the latest cinematic releases. For those looking for more interactive fun, the mall boasts a large gaming zone equipped with modern VR and video games, appealing to both children and adults. And for a bit of friendly competition, the bowling alley is a fantastic addition, providing hours of enjoyment. This makes it an ideal spot for family outings or a fun evening with friends.
The dining options at CMR Central are equally impressive and diverse. The food court, often referred to as "Food Lounge," is a culinary haven, bringing together flavors from across India. You'll find popular fast-food chains like Ice creams, KFC, Burger King, and Pizza Hut, ensuring there's something for every craving. Whether you're in the mood for a quick bite or a more relaxed meal, the variety of choices is excellent.
The ambiance and maintenance of the mall are consistently good. The interiors are well-maintained, clean, and spacious, creating a comfortable and pleasant environment for visitors. The staff across various stores and facilities are generally polite and helpful, contributing to a positive customer experience. Even during busy periods, the mall manages to maintain a sense of order.
Furthermore, the convenience of accessibility to CMR Central in Gajuwaka is a significant advantage. Its location makes it easily reachable for residents in and around the area. Ample parking facilities for both two-wheelers and four-wheelers, including basement parking, alleviate the usual stress of finding a spot in a bustling urban area.
In summary, CMR Central Mall in Gajuwaka is more than just a shopping destination; it's a complete lifestyle center. With its extensive retail offerings, engaging entertainment avenues, diverse food court, and well-maintained premises, it consistently provides a great experience for all its visitors. It's truly a testament to a well-designed and well-managed mall that caters effectively to the needs of the community.

Suggestions:- there should be baby feeding room
As it is available at Airports

places.address: 26, 41-8, Exhibition Road, Chaitanya Nagar, Gajuwaka, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 530026, India

places.name: Design A'Line

reviews.text: I am delighted to share my positive experience with Design A Line . Their innovative designs and attention to detail exceeded my expectations. The team displayed exceptional professionalism, ensuring a seamless process from conceptualization to completion. I appreciate their commitment to creating a space that not only reflects my vision but also incorporates cutting-edge design principles. Kudos to [Architecture Firm] for turning my dream project into a stunning reality. I highly recommend their services for anyone seeking top-notch architectural expertise.

I recently had the pleasure of collaborating with Design A'Line for a home interior project, and I am absolutely delighted with the exceptional service and results they provided.

From the initial consultation to the final reveal, Design A'Line demonstrated a remarkable level of professionalism and expertise. The designer exhibited a keen understanding of my preferences and lifestyle, and he skillfully translated my vision into a stunning reality.

What truly distinguishes Design A'Line is it's unwavering commitment to quality. He meticulously selected the finest materials, furnishings, and finishes, ensuring a harmonious blend of aesthetics and functionality in every corner of my home.

Throughout the project, communication was seamless and transparent, and deadlines were consistently met. Design A'Line's dedication to client satisfaction shone through in every aspect of their work, making the entire experience enjoyable and stress-free.

I enthusiastically recommend Design A'Line to anyone seeking top-tier interior design services. Their passion for design, professionalism, and unwavering commitment to excellence make them an outstanding choice for transforming any space into a work of art. I am absolutely thrilled with the outcome of my project and can't wait to enjoy my exquisitely designed home for years to come.

I highly recommend Design Aline for their exceptional architectural services. Their team of talented architects consistently delivers innovative and aesthetically pleasing designs. From concept to construction, they exhibit a keen attention to detail and a commitment to sustainable practices. Their ability to blend functionality with artistry results in spaces that not only look stunning but also serve their intended purpose flawlessly. Working with Design Aline is a seamless and enjoyable experience, making them a top choice for any architectural project.

places.generalDescription: Nestled in the vibrant city of Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh, Mrs. A.V.N. College boasts a rich history that dates back to its inception as The Anglo Vernacular School in the 1860s. This esteemed institution has been a nurturing ground for numerous distinguished personalities, including Nobel laureate Sir C.V. Raman and other notable figures like Sri B.S. Sarma and Prof. C.R. Rao, who have left an indelible mark on various fields.

sources.snippet: The start of Modern teaching in India began at the Mrs. A.V.N college of Vishakapatnam in 1860. This Anglo ‚Äì Vernacular institution promoted the Hindu education system and was nurtured by the Zamindars of that period. Set on undulating terrain, the stone ashlar masonry structure is planned around open courtyards, continuous verandahs with a central entrance leading to an arched portico dividing the form into two wings.
sources.shortName: Architecture of Indian Cities: Visakhapatnam- The Steel City

sources.snippet: The colleges include Andhra University, Mrs. A.V.N College, GITAM university, Gayathri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering, Damodaran Law University etc. The nearby hospitals are Apollo hospital, OMNI hospital, Queen's NRI hospital Indus Vizag Hospital, Usha hospital etc. Visakhapatnam is one of the fastest growing cities in the world.
sources.shortName: New Projects in Visakhapatnam | 911+ Upcoming Projects in Visakhapatnam

places.name: Mrs.A.V.N.College

reviews.text: I was very happy today to visit Mrs AVN college this morning. I thank the Principal sir, as he gave me permission to take pictures of the college premises. My brothers studied here, and I wrote my intermediate exams here. The college has a great history with eminent leaders who studied in this college and served our country. Example Alluri Seetha Rama Raju freedom fighter and the first President of India , Dr. Rajendra Prasad.Dr. CV Raman was also a student of this college. I appreciate the cleanliness of the college and the campus maintained very well. The college has a young and dynamic principal, who is responsible for the cleanliness of the college and the campus. He was very kind and hospitable and spoke very well and was happy to see the old students in the campus. The building was well maintained and brought back excellent memories. I still remember the majestic arches and the classrooms, very big, spacious, with huge windows for light and fresh air. I thank God for giving me this opportunity to visit such an esteemed college. Thank you principal sir, once again.

I had my UPSC ESE exam here. Good arrangement for students for keeping their bags free of cost and vehicle parking also there, staff's behaviour was good. There was only one problem, the sound of vehicles horn was coming continuously from the surrounding street.

One of the oldest colleges of Visakhapatnam, it was established way back in 1860. It has a illustrious alumini including great freedom fighters, scientists, academicians, and some great personalities. It has a high school, degree and a polytechnic college. Located in the old city it was once a bustling college for intermediate and degree. It also houses one of the oldest  NCC battalions. The iconic rock structures are famous and are maintained well.

places.generalDescription: Bavikonda Ancient Buddhist Monastery, situated near Visakhapatnam, is an important historical site dating back to the 3rd century BCE. The name Bavikonda, meaning Hill of Wells, originates from the numerous wells on the hill used for collecting rainwater. This archaeological site boasts various artifacts such as Roman and Satavahana coins, pottery dating back to 3rd century BC and 2nd Century AD.

sources.snippet: Located 16kms from the city, Bavionda is a reminder of the Buddhist influence in Vishakhapatnam. Sitting on a height of 130m from the mean sea level Bacikonda is a complex with numerous step-wells harvesting rainwater. Due to the location of Vishakapatnam, the port city hosts rainfall for the better part of a year.
sources.shortName: Architecture of Indian Cities: Visakhapatnam- The Steel City

sources.snippet: Bavikonda is a hill on the North west of Timmapuram is situated in between Visakhapatnam and Bheemunipatnam Beach road and located at 2 Kms. Interior from the beach road point. On the hill noticed a Buddist site in the middle of the plain with antiquities
sources.shortName: Monuments | Visakhapatnam District, Government of Andhra Pradesh

places.name: Bavikonda Ancient Buddhist Monastery

reviews.text: Great place for knowing the Buddhist timeline.

Can you believe they built 2 interpretation centers on this hill for this now abandoned tourism site! Even the Qutub shah heritage park in Hyderabad spread out over several acres has only one heritage center and it is much much smaller. why do they need two buildings on this hill? It is not even on the beach road! they pocketed public funds with help from the builder. The ultimate joke is now the centers have turned in to bigger ruins than the original Buddhist excavations on this hill.

A must-visit for history lovers.

The road leading to the site (which is atop a hill) was full of vegetation (huge tree branches ‚Ä¶) narrowing the path significantly - definitely in need of some maintenance. There's some space to park your vehicle just outside the site's entrance.

The site, per se, is a marvel of those days! Those familiar with Buddhism and history would be able to appreciate it in its entirety. However, the site needs upkeep - more information boards, proper gates, and personnel. I spotted a few visitors walking on the ancient structures; although I asked them not to, there's clearly a need for security personnel.

Thotlakonda, on the other hand, was very well maintained.

Hope the Archaeology Department steps in.

places.generalDescription: St. John's Parish Church, located near the old post office in Vizag, is a significant historical landmark. Constructed during British colonial times, it was the first church built by the East India Company using its own funds and designed under the supervision of Sir Arthur Cotton. The church boasts architectural elements such as an Anglican dome, round pillars, and a preserved Madras roofing. It features Burma teak wood and stained glass from Europe, along with an ancient functional pipe organ.

sources.snippet: Emitting an English residential and institutional influence, the church consists of several architectural elements. The Anglican dome, big round pillars, the entrance flanked by a corbelled stone arch represents the contemporary era. Keeping the typical Madras roofing intact, the preservers have restored the built form in the best way possible.
sources.shortName: Architecture of Indian Cities: Visakhapatnam- The Steel City

places.name: St.John's Parish Church

reviews.text: St. John's is one of the reminiscent of Colonial past. Constructed by East India Company but supervised and designed by Sir Arthur Cotton. It is known for its alter made of Burma teak and stained glassed. There is also an Organ functional.

One of the oldest Churches of Vizag built during British colonial times. Designed and initially built under guidance of Sir Arthur Cotton, who was dedigned and constructed cotton barrage and camal system of Godavari River at Rajahmundry. Great place and a must vidit if you are interested in Heritage of Vizag.

One of the oldest churches in vizag. School attached to compound. Ample parking space

Check out the old obituary messages on the wall. Some are 200 years old

reviews.text:
Gitam School of Architecture in Visakhapatnam is an exceptional institution that excels in various aspects.

The well-designed curriculum, coupled with state-of-the-art infrastructure, provides students with a holistic learning experience.

The dedicated faculty brings a perfect blend of academic knowledge and practical insights to the classroom.

The emphasis on internships and strong placement assistance ensures that students are well-prepared for successful careers in architecture.
A standout choice for those seeking quality education and a thriving professional future.

Do visit n have a campus  tour of GSA

This Stupid college charges students 3 LPA and couldn't even hold hard work done by students on sheets long enough until they graduate atleast. If you guys have to throw away the sheets and models, just return to the students.
It's hard earned and built, you just kept the high price and made education a business. They'll have a good memory of their education if you return their belongings to them. I feel pity for all the students who graduated from GITAM.

GITAM School of Architecture is located in the picturisque location of Visakhapatnam near to the Rushikonda beach of Bay of Bengal. GITAM is a Deemed to be university with flexible and progressive curriculum with world class infrastructure of library, sports facilities, student hostels,  class room facilities. School of Archtiecture is having B.Arch & M.Arch program. B.Arch program is being offered since the year 2011 with students from various parts of India. The faculty are well qualified from diverse educational background. Faculty are having mix of industry and academic experience to impart the practical aspects of professional learning of the curriculum. It is one of the best architecture institution in south India.

sources.snippet: The King George Hospital (KGH) has been an icon of medical assurance for Vizag and its surrounding areas right since the day it opened its doors in 1923. Affiliated to the Andhra Medical College, this government hospital is equipped with technologically advanced equipment like the Nuclear Medicine block and Dialysis Unit, staffed with highly skilled and experienced staff. The main building is a monumental structure, built around 1845 on a 35-acre land donated by the Budhavarapu family.
sources.shortName: 5 iconic structures in Visakhapatnam you need to know about

sources.snippet: The three-story stone masonry structure is built on a symmetrical plan with a central corridor and entrance towards the north. The entire construction was made of dressed stone masonry. To the extreme north of the entrance, the corridor is constructed as a four-story avenue where the fourth floor houses a clock.
sources.shortName: Architecture of Indian Cities: Visakhapatnam- The Steel City

places.name: King George Hospital

reviews.text:
Very bad treatment. My dad got heart attack and we admitted in KGh. They gave tablets which was not supportive to my dad's body and he got stroke twice. They only concentrate on money not on health. Even the doctor's didn't give proper response. Never ever trust this hospital or doctors.
I really appreciate all the doctors and nursing staff for their commitment.

The services that I receive from them is excellent. Doctors and staff are friendly and ensure that I am properly informed about my health and care.

Great experience from start to finish. Doctors taking time to go over the diagnosis clearly and treatment options.

I would recommend this Hospital to anyone seeking answers to better their health and do so in a very personalized way.

King George hospital (KGH) is a government hospital which is the main and major hospital for three districts like Visakhapatnam, Vizianagaram Srikakulam.
It has a long history and which was built in the British ruling time.
Recently I visited the op gate for my relatives. I would like to share my experience with you all.

Two years back when I visited they gave nice treatment but unfortunately when I visited the op dept(op gate) recently , I observed a lot of delay while giving treatment to the patient.

We can see mostly junior doctors/trainees from AP medical college on the floor of op department while giving treatment. It's very hard to find senior doctors on the floor especially on the weekends.

Due to lack of experience and knowledge junior doctors take a lot of time for decision making to give what kind of treatment to patient. If there is a senior doctor on the floor, all junior doctors are following them and leaving some of the patients.

Some of the patients come for general and normal problems but jr. Doctors unable to tell where to go. They simply say sit on the bed and we'll come and see. Even after an hour also they said give us sometime, we'll  come.

Coming to the lab and report related, jr.doctor not sure exactly what is the problem . At the time these doctors sending the images/reports through WhatsApp and asking the decision. Then senior doctors  sending medical description and suggestions what to do. Then jr.doctors convey the same thing to patients.

Here I have seen some doctors, crossing their limits and giving lectures to the patients. Even they call other doctors in a disrespectful manner in front of patients.

Doctors prescribed medicine like 10 different tablets, out of 10 only 8 tablets giving in the medicine counters. Expensive tablets, staff asking us to buy outside. This is a government hospital they should provide free of cost.

My humble request to Government, Please looks into these issues. It could be better if you improve the hospitality and how doctors are given the treatment.

Very poor service poor hygiene this hospital is not at all taking care of patients worst experience it's been 3 days my maid had took her son to kGH but they didn't gave any treatment and he died today very bad treatment . I would like to tell people to not go to this worst hospital

places.generalDescription: The Office of District Collector, located in Maharanipeta, Visakhapatnam, is a flamboyant E-shaped castle built during the British period. The ashlar stone masonry structure features an asymmetrical elevation and represents gothic architecture with a series of steps leading to the entrance. Divided into four main parts, the office boasts traditional style staircases, arches, windows and pavilions. Its strategic design symbolically represents the authority of the British Empire.

sources.snippet: The E-shaped castle is an ashlar stone masonry structure with asymmetrical elevation. The church represents gothic architecture with an entrance lead by a series of steps. The Office is divided into four main parts with doglegged wooden staircase provided at the middle of each wing extending towards the courtyard.
